name: Tableau MCP Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server for interacting with the Tableau platform

SERVER.description: The URL of the Tableau server to connect to

SITE_NAME.description: The name of the Tableau site to connect to

PAT_NAME.description: The name of the Tableau Personal Access Token to use for authentication

PAT_VALUE.description: The value of the Tableau Personal Access Token to use for authentication

TRANSPORT.description: The MCP transport type to use for the server. Must be http.

ENABLE_SERVER_LOGGING.description: When true, the server will continue sending notifications to MCP clients
